info.name: Target Contract 07/07/6456: UAN
info.desc:
Our client has requested our support in elimating key targets. During an intelligence operation our client has intercepted data regarding a meeting between the terrorist groups and a rival faction.
Whilst it is unclear why this meeting is happening, our clients have expressed interest in the elimination of their rival faction's ships. A planned ambush will happen where this meeting will take place. Destroy all ships belonging to the rival faction.
